p: Recently, certain EOs have been proposed as non-toxic anti-angiogenic agents. Bonstancioglu et al. [ 24] reported the capacity of Origanum EOs to inhibit cancer cell viability and angiogenesis [ 24]. The EOsâ€™ constituents carvacrol [ 25] and thymol [ 26] have been reported to have cytotoxic effects on cancer cell lines. Liang and Lu [ 27] reported the pro-apoptotic activity of carvacrol, considered the main bioactive compound for pro-apoptotic and anti-angiogenic effects [ 25, 26, 27].
